japanese_title: 梟の神が自ら歌った謡「コンクワ」
japanese_translation: (1) katken......川ガラス.昔から大そういい鳥として尊ばれる鳥です.
chinese_translation: (1) katken......川玻璃。自古以來就被視為非常吉祥的鳥。
english_translation: (1) katken......River Dipper. It is a bird that has been highly respected as a very good bird since ancient times.
updated_chinese_translation: (1) katken......河烏。自古以來就被視為非常好的鳥，備受尊崇。
update_comment: The English translation is a bit repetitive, especially with "very good bird". The Chinese translation is more concise and elegant. The phrase "備受尊崇" (bèi shòu zūn chóng) captures the nuance of being highly respected in a more sophisticated way than "highly respected as a very good bird". The updated translation will aim for conciseness and elegance, incorporating the spirit of the Chinese translation.
updated_english_translation: (1) katken......River Dipper. It is a bird highly revered since ancient times for its excellence.
